Description:
311991514 - You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, the health, safety, and welfare at work of all your employees in that you have not provided plant and systems of work which are safe and without risk to health in that the Bronx 400 ton Press Brake machine has either no or inadequate safeguarding arrangements in place to prevent access to dangerous moving parts of the tool or mechanism.

311991569 - You have not produced evidence to show a written scheme for periodic examination of your pressure system which includes the BOGE Air receiver Serial Number 5099781 and associated pipework had been drawn up or certified as being suitable by a competent person and that the pressure system had been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in accordance with that scheme and a report of such examination obtained and kept available for inspection.
